features: Pʀᴇᴍɪᴜᴍ Qᴜᴀʟɪᴛʏ: Aleva Naturals Bamboo Baby Wipes have no harsh ingredients and gently soothes and cleanses your baby's skin.

Nᴀᴛᴜʀᴀʟ Iɴɢʀᴇᴅɪᴇɴᴛꜱ: This gentle wipe is made with rayon from bamboo and formulated with plant-based natural and organic ingredients to not only clean but to help moisturize delicate and sensitive skin.

Pᴇʀꜰᴇᴄᴛ Fᴏʀ Yᴏᴜʀ Bᴀʙʏ: Wipes are 100% biodegradable in just 21 days. The combination of Organic Aloe Vera, Chamomile, Natural Tea Tree Oil and Lavender Oils gently cleanses, soothes, and leaves your baby's skin feeling silky smooth.
Sᴛʀᴏɴɢ Aɴᴅ Lᴀʀɢᴇ: These large wipes are super soft and cross-woven which means they are stronger and more durable than conventional wipes. Perfect for use at home or while traveling.
Cᴀʀᴇ Fᴏʀ Bᴀʙʏ: These ultra soft Bamboo Baby Wipes are specifically designed with babies in mind. These wipes are Chlorine, Sulphates, and Parabens-Free, and are proudly Canadian.
body.description: 𝐀𝐥𝐞𝐯𝐚 𝐍𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐥𝐬 presents Bamboo Baby Wipes that are free of all harsh ingredients. These wipes are formulated with plant-based natural and organic ingredients to not only clean but to help moisturize delicate and sensitive skin. These wipes are 100% biodegradable in just 21 days. The combination of Organic Aloe Vera, Chamomile, Natural Tea Tree Oil, and Lavender Oils gently cleans baby's diaper are, leaving their skin feeling soft and silky-smooth. These wipes are specifically designed with babies in mind to alleviate moms' worry. Proudly Canadian. 𝐅𝐞𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞𝐬: Hypoallergenic bamboo baby wipes Made with rayon from bamboo Free of all harsh chemicals Enriched with Organic Aloe Vera, Chamomile, Natural Tea Tree Oil and Lavender Oils 100% biodegradable in just 21 days Wipes are gentle on your baby's skin Helps to moisturize delicate and sensitive skin 30 Count (Pack of 12) Proudly Canadian

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these biodegradable wipes
reviews.reviewText: I love these biodegradable wipes. As far as I understand, these are made of biodegradable fiber and I actually use them in my compost toilet/compost pile and they always break down easily. I believe most wipes are made of some type of poly material which is not biodegradable. These particular units I ordered on accident because the packages are smaller than what I usually order, but the wipes are the same size, so I've been happy with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars good wipes for camping
reviews.reviewText: I use this product for quick cleanups while camping and I'm very happy with it. Very soft scent and texture yet does not fall apart. I appreciate that it's made from sustainable materials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars MINIATURE wipe bag NOT original Aleva wipes
reviews.reviewText: Oops bought these by mistake. More expensive than the bigger original ones without the nice snap closure. They are little 4" bags with a sticky flap, 30 wipes folded in half. Good for your car middle console? Or camping like another reviewer has mentioned. Just unexpected. I'll keep it, not worth the 8 bucks saved returning/reordering the original 80ct full size... what I meant to buy. Writing this review to help inform you: These are *TRAVEL* size, read the fine print before purchasing and be aware not the best value comparatively.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: In the description on of the product, it is unscent, however when I opened the package, a terrible scent come out. Cannot accept the scent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wipes that doesn’t irritate sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: My daughter have eczema and her skin is very sensitive. These wipes along with water wipes do not irritate her skin. All the other wipes I tried made her butt red and itchy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2020
reviews.reviewText: The picture of the product is misleading and inaccurate. The pictures says 80 count and shows a sturdy plastic opening. What arrived is a 30 count package with the thin plastic peel back lid. I thought I was buying what the picture showed and am disappointed in what I got.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: I love these, just wish they were alittle bigger.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not wet enough!
reviews.reviewText: Alright guys. I wanted to like these wipes more than anything. I was so ecstatic to try them. But I. Could. Not. Wait. To. Run. Out. Of. Them. I love that they are biodegradable. They smell great! Good ingredients. But my gosh I had to wipe hard for them to do the trick, and I change my baby frequently. I felt like they weren’t wet enough. Any time my baby had a poopy diaper, I just got out other wipes because I didn’t want to deal with it. I am so happy I just ran out! Woo hoo on to wetter wipes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: Not as good as hoped but does the job
reviews.reviewText: Biodegradable wipes, even able to be flushed....but packaged in plastic and delivered with yet more plastic 🙄As for the actual product, sadly not the best at cleaning, they do the job but no where near as well as a standard babywipe. Lovely mild scent and perfect for my allergy prone skin though.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great Travel Size Biodegradable Baby Wipes
reviews.reviewText: Love these wipes as they are biodegradable. We use cloth diapers, so the biodegradable element is important to us - we put these directly into the green bin/compost. We use the larger format in our nursery at home, and this smaller format for travel in our diaper bag. Really like the smaller size so it doesn't take up so much space in our diaper bag.

Great wipe. The only thing I don’t like is the packaging where you open the wipe, it is plastic and not durable, easy to rip. The wipe itself is great though. Pleasant scent. Cleans whatever body part you use the wipe on well.

We've been using those wipes for 4 years now... my boys were having redness with other big brand names and tried those never went back to the other ones. Also there not soak with water and they can endure a big "job" without ripping apart. Would recommend to everyone sensitive bums or not.
